article.title: Raytheon to Upgrade Missile Targeting System Software
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: High Speed Anti-Radiation Missile Targeting System

article.text: Raytheon Company, Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded about $7 million for the High Speed Anti-Radiation Missile Targeting System software upgrade two risk reduction study. Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
